notes.text:
This update for libraw fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-1729: Fixed a heap buffer overflow when converting an
  image (bsc#1210720).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A flaw was found in LibRaw. A heap-buffer-overflow in raw2image_ex() caused by a maliciously crafted file may lead to an application crash.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
